Methodology + Consulting

We can structure unique systems depending on your application, or give step by step programs that have been field tested and proven for their success. Combining a unique blend of premium organic nutrients, soil, beneficial inoculates and mycorrhizae, with hands on personal instructions in application and methodology, our techniques speak for themselves by the results which manifest.

WHY GREEN BODHI

We feel by refining our perspective through contemplative science, combined with balancing our motivation to benefit others, our garden can blossom in a unique way of healing. Through skillful means and a relation in caring for wisdom plants, we can start to uncover the links of dependence between the garden, and ultimately all things that we call Intentional Horticulture
